statements: DELETE FROM bioengineered_plants WHERE species = 'Roses' AND breeding_program_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Breeding_Programs WHERE lead_scientist = 'Dr. Smith';
DELETE FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE program_name = 'Summer Breeding';
DELETE FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_name='Height' AND observation_date<'2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PlantBreeding WHERE breeding_date>'2021-06-30' AND plant_id IN (SELECT plant_id FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_name='Color');
DELETE FROM PlantTraits WHERE trait_value = 'High' AND plant_id = 1001;
DELETE FROM BreedingPrograms WHERE program_name = 'Winter Program';
DELETE FROM PlantTraits WHERE plant_id = 1 AND trait_id = 2;
DELETE FROM GeneticMarkers WHERE marker_id = 100 AND plant_id = 5
